original_text: And Gideon the son of Joash died in a good old age, and was buried in the sepulchre of Joash his father, in Ophrah of the Abiezrites.
korean_text: 요아스의 아들 기드온이 나이가 많아 죽으매 아비에셀 사람의 오브라에 있는 그의 아버지 요아스의 묘실에 장사되었더라

sentences.original_text: And Gideon the son of Joash died
and was buried in the sepulchre of Joash his father
